properties.name: apiml.catalog.standalone
properties.description:
API Catalog standalone configuration.
Standalone mode allows publicly display, without need for authentication, services that are stored on the disk. API Catalog does not connect to any other
service.

properties.name: apiml.catalog.standalone.enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether to enable standalone mode.
Standalone mode allows publicly display, without need for authentication, services that are stored on the disk. API Catalog does not connect to any other
service.
